definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: The turbidite rocks are found in the outer fan.
Turbidites were deposited in the dark shale of normal lake facies.
sentences.chinese: 濁積岩沉積在正常的湖相暗色泥岩之中。

sentences.english: The clastic rocks widespread in the Triassic Xikang Group in western Sichuan consist dominantly of turbiditic flysch formations.
sentences.chinese: 三疊系西康羣碎屑岩主體爲一套濁積岩復理石建造。
